Package owltools.yaml.golrconfig Description

YAML GOlr Configuration

This package supplies the tools necessary to parse, probe, and dump the YAML file configurations for BBOP-JS constrained Solr indexes. Specifically, it can parse YAML files for use with the FlexSolrDocumentLoader and take multiple YAML files and turn them into a Solr schema that is compatible SolrSchemaXMLWriter.
